abstract: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway bought 29,600 more shares of Burlington Northern Santa Fe stock, giving Berkshire ownership of 17.4 percent of the nation’s second-largest railroad.
lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway bought 29,600 more shares of Burlington Northern Santa Fe stock, giving Berkshire ownership of 17.4 percent of the nation’s second-largest railroad.
